Stories course
In Instagram

The course will cover all your questions from analyzing and planning content for stories to its creation and design.

You will know a clear algorithm for working with stories to increase an outreach and receive a set of all the necessary templates, tools and instructions for further work.

Duration: 2 weeks
Buy course
Leave a request to contact manager

Course program

Module 1 First week of studying

Correctly analyze and create a content strategy

  • Content plan, rubric-making and
    analytics
  • Stories fundamentals and highlights
  • Stories rubrics
  • Stories insights

After the module

  • you know how to work with each indicator of insights in stories
  • you know how to categorize content so that goals are met
  • understand the principles of the algorithm and use it for the profile purposes
  • you make a content plan that you want to open every day
  • you analyze content not to tick a box, but to understand the target audience and increase statistics
  • you know how to make working highlights
Module 2 second week of studying

Create content and visualize information

  • How to increase outreach in stories
  • How to diversify stories
  • Common mistakes in stories design
  • Stories design instructions

After the module

  • you know a clear algorithm how to increase outreach in stories
  • you know common mistakes in design and are surprised by your creatives “before” and “after”
  • you know how to diversify stories so as not to annoy subscribers who have been in the account for a long time
  • you use ready-made templates and elements for stories in Figma without wasting time
  • you can quickly arrange content in applications and in Instagram functionality

Who is the course for?

  • 01
    SMM
    newbie
    «I want to learn how to professionally work with stories in order to receive income from their management.»
  • 02
    SMM
    specialists
    «I want to close all questions about stories in Instagram, increase my level and bill.»
  • 03
    Business
    owner
    «I want to develop the team and train my specialist.»
